depositIntoStrategy(address,address,uint.details: The `msg.sender` must have previously approved this contract to transfer at least `amount` of `token` on their behalf.Cannot be called by an address that is 'frozen' (this function will revert if the `msg.sender` is frozen).

params.amount: is the amount of token to be invested in the strategy by the depositor
params.strategy: is the specified strategy where investment is to be made,
params.token: is the denomination in which the investment is to be made,

depositIntoStrategyOnBehalfOf(address,ad.details: The `msg.sender` must have previously approved this contract to transfer at least `amount` of `token` on their behalf.A signature is required for this function to eliminate the possibility of griefing attacks, specifically those targetting stakers who may be attempting to undelegate.Cannot be called on behalf of a staker that is 'frozen' (this function will revert if the `staker` is frozen).

params.amount: is the amount of token to be invested in the strategy by the depositor
params.expiry: the timestamp at which the signature expires
params.r: and @param vs are the elements of the ECDSA signature
params.staker: the staker that the assets will be deposited on behalf of
params.strategy: is the specified strategy where investment is to be made,
params.token: is the denomination in which the investment is to be made,

DEPOSIT_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the deposit struct used by the contract

DOMAIN_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the contract's domain

delegation().notice: Returns the single, central Delegation contract of EigenLayer

depositIntoStrategy(address,address,uint.notice: Deposits `amount` of `token` into the specified `strategy`, with the resultant shares credited to `depositor`

depositIntoStrategyOnBehalfOf(address,ad.notice: Used for investing an asset into the specified strategy with the resultant shared created to `staker`, who must sign off on the action

getDeposits(address).notice: Get all details on the depositor's investments and corresponding shares

investorStratShares(address,address).notice: Returns the current shares of `user` in `strategy`

documentation.text: @notice The EIP-712 typehash for the contract's domain
@notice The EIP-712 typehash for the deposit struct used by the contract

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Deposit(address strategy,address token,uint256 amount,uint256 nonce,uint256 expiry)"

arguments.value: Deposit(address strategy,address token,uint256 amount,uint256 nonce,uint256 expiry)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Deposit(address strategy,address token,uint256 amount,uint256 nonce,uint256 expiry)"
